title: Beam up 43% as today’s top crypto gainer

title: IOTA at the Forefront: Pioneering 6G’s Intelligent Network Revolution
description: The evolution to 6G networks introduces challenges in implementing federated learning due to scalability issues. IOTA emerges as a key player in 6G’s transformative architecture by employing a hierarchical federated learning network for optimized communication and secure data sharing.
